response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business operations. Given its high quality and functionality, I estimate its true worth to be well above $8,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and exceptional customer support. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive deal. I look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
